sentences.english: To explore the significance of adenosine deaminase in patients with tuberculous pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在结核性胸膜炎中的临床意义。

sentences.english: PACAP, Rat pituitary adenylate cyclase activating polypeptide.
sentences.chinese: 大鼠垂体腺苷酸环化酶激活肽。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of adenosine deaminase in chronic hepatitis B patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腺苷脱氨酶在慢性乙型肝炎中的应用价值。

sentences.english: This leads to stimulation of adenyl cyclase which also is located on the cell surface.
sentences.chinese: 这会刺激位于细胞表面上的腺苷酸环化酶。

sentences.english: Our previous study found that this effect of adenosine was mediated by adenosine A2A-receptor.
sentences.chinese: 我们的研究发现这一作用是由腺苷A2A受体介导的。

sentences.english: They found a 24-fold rise in adenosine, which seemed promising.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现，腺苷增加了24倍，这似乎指明了方向。

sentences.english: The peak value of platelet intracellular calcium oscillations was diminished.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸腺苷诱导的血小板钙波动峰值降低。

sentences.english: The effect of adenosine is blocked by adrenergic receptor blockers.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺素受体阻断剂部分或全部阻断腺苷的作用。

sentences.english: However, the diatom species S. costatum could only use ATP and GMP.
sentences.chinese: 而中肋骨条藻只能利用腺苷酸和鸟苷酸两种有机磷源。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnostic value of serum adenosine deaminase activity in pulmonary tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血清腺苷脱氨酶对肺结核的诊断价值。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To improve the synthesis methods of vidarabine monophosphate.
sentences.chinese: 目的改进单磷酸阿糖腺苷的合成工艺。

sentences.english: It blocks adenosine, a chemical that makes you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 它阻挡腺苷，腺苷是一种使你昏昏欲睡的化学物质。

sentences.english: It blocks adenosine, a chemical that makes you drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 它阻挡腺苷，腺苷是一种使你昏昏欲睡的化学物质。

sentences.english: Conclusion Irbesartan can be used to revert LVH in patients with EH.
sentences.chinese: 结论二丁酰环磷腺苷钙可逆转EH患者LVH。

sentences.english: Conclusion ATP test has a higher value for diagnosing DAVNP.
sentences.chinese: 结论三磷酸腺苷试验诊断房室结双径路有较高的价值。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish an HPLC method for the determination of adenosine in F.
sentences.chinese: 目的采用HPLC法测定平贝母中腺苷的含量。

definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)
polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)/same as 肽[tai4]
